title: Dynamics - acceleration of block on incline

content.description: A block of mass <math alttext="m equals 0.30 kilograms" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.30</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi></math> slides down an incline that makes an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees" overflow="scroll"> <mn>30</mn> <mo>°</mo> </math> with the horizontal. The coefficient of kinetic friction between the block and the incline is <math alttext="mu equals 0.20" overflow="scroll"><mi>μ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.20</mn></math> as shown.
content.question: Which of the following is most nearly the acceleration of the block along the incline?

choices.label: <math alttext="3.0 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="3.3 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="6.7 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="7.7 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>7.7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3.3 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
